snippet: This season, “Big Brother” offers a rare opportunity to watch white privilege and unconscious racism in the field.
abstract: Jon Caramanica maintains that current season of CBS reality show Big Brother offers rare opportunity to observe examples of white privilege and unconscious racism on prime time television.
lead_paragraph: This season, “Big Brother” offers a rare opportunity to watch white privilege and unconscious racism in the field.

headline.print_headline: Rare, but Real, A Racial Divide In Prime Time
headline.seo: ‘Big Brother’ Becomes a Lab Experiment In Overt Racism
headline.main: Rare, but Real, a Racial Divide in Prime Time
